original: @67a # // rgya gar skad du //
analyzed: @67a # // rgya gar skad du //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: badzra t'i kshna ya m'a ri s'a dha nam n'a ma /
analyzed: badzra t'i kshna ya m'a ri s'a dha nam n'a ma /
translated: Vajratīkṣṇayamāri-sādhana-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: gshin rje gshed rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs //
translated: The Means of Attaining Vajra-sharp Yamantaka

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrasattva.

original: dam tshig sems can don byed cing //
analyzed: dam tshig sems can don byed cing //
translated: For the sake of beings to be tamed,🔽and for the wisdom of perseverance,🔽with a pure and clear mind,

original: nan tan ye shes phyir mi ldog / mar gad ljang gu'i mdog 'dra la //🔽rab tu dang bas btud byas te //
analyzed: nan tan ye shes phyir mi ldog / mar gad ljang gu'i mdog 'dra la // rab tu dang bas btud byas te //
translated: I bow to the color of emerald🔽and the one who is undeluded.

original: brtul zhugs thogs pa med pa yis //
analyzed: brtul zhugs thogs pa med pa yis //
translated: With unimpeded discipline,

original: las kyi don kun rab 'grub phyir //🔽dgra nag rgyud la nyer bsten nas //
analyzed: las kyi don kun rab 'grub phyir // dgra nag rgyud la nyer bsten nas //
translated: for the sake of accomplishing all activities,🔽I will explain the means of attaining the vajra of jealousy

original: phrag dog rdo rje'i sgrub thabs bshad //
analyzed: phrag dog rdo rje'i sgrub thabs bshad //
translated: by relying on the Kṛṣṇa Yamāri Tantra.

original: dpal ldan g-yo sgyu @67b med pa yis //
analyzed: dpal ldan g-yo sgyu @67b med pa yis //
translated: With glorious and unwavering

original: bla ma mgon la btud sbyangs te //
analyzed: bla ma mgon la btud sbyangs te //
translated: devotion to the guru protector,

original: bum sogs dbang ni thob nas kyang //
analyzed: bum sogs dbang ni thob nas kyang //
translated: having obtained the vase empowerment and so forth,

original: dam bcas nas ni bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: dam bcas nas ni bsgrub par bya //
translated: one should practice with commitment.

original: rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar dmigs te //
analyzed: rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar dmigs te //
translated: Visualizing oneself as the excellent deity,

original: snying gar ri bong can gyi dkyil //
analyzed: snying gar ri bong can gyi dkyil //
translated: in the center of the moon at the heart,

original: dhri: yig 'od zer lnga ldan las //
analyzed: dhri: yig 'od zer lnga ldan las //
translated: From the letter DHRĪH, which has five lights,

original: zhing gnyis ma lus sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: zhing gnyis ma lus sbyang bar bya //
translated: purify the two realms without exception.

original: khyad par yul la brten nas kyang //
analyzed: khyad par yul la brten nas kyang //
translated: In particular, based on the object,

original: phra rab lus kyi phyag 'tshal bya //
analyzed: phra rab lus kyi phyag 'tshal bya //
translated: perform prostrations with the subtle body.

original: tsa rtsi la sogs rnam 'phrul gyis //
analyzed: tsa rtsi la sogs rnam 'phrul gyis //
translated: With emanations such as Cāryā,

original: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa bya //
analyzed: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa bya //
translated: perform outer, inner, and secret offerings.

original: sdig sogs dag par byas nas kyang //
analyzed: sdig sogs dag par byas nas kyang //
translated: Having purified misdeeds and so on,

original: rje btsun pa ni mkha' la gshegs //
analyzed: rje btsun pa ni mkha' la gshegs //
translated: the Venerable One departs into space.

original: don dam kun rdzob byang chub sems //
analyzed: don dam kun rdzob byang chub sems //
translated: Meditate on ultimate and relative bodhicitta

original: tshangs pa'i gnas dang stong pa bsgom //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas dang stong pa bsgom //
translated: and the Brahmā state and emptiness.

original: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
translated: oṃ śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmako ’haṃ

original: nyi dkyil 'od zer lnga ldan pa'i //
analyzed: nyi dkyil 'od zer lnga ldan pa'i //
translated: On a sun maṇḍala with five lights,

original: h'um las srung ba'i 'khor lo bsam //
analyzed: h'um las srung ba'i 'khor lo bsam //
translated: think of the protection wheel from hūṃ.

original: padma'i steng du nyi ma ste //
analyzed: padma'i steng du nyi ma ste //
translated: On a lotus and sun,

original: dh'i: las autpala ral grir gyur //
analyzed: dh'i: las autpala ral grir gyur //
translated: from dḥīḥ comes a sword utpala.

original: spro bsdus sku gsung thugs bcug ste //
analyzed: spro bsdus sku gsung thugs bcug ste //
translated: Through the emanation and reabsorbing of body, speech, and mind,

original: gyur pas phrag dog gshin rje gshed //
analyzed: gyur pas phrag dog gshin rje gshed //
translated: it becomes the jealous-god Yama.

original: mar gang ljang gu lta bur mdzes //
analyzed: mar gang ljang gu lta bur mdzes //
translated: The color of melted butter, he is beautiful.

original: sdo dang dkar ba g-yas g-yon zhal //
analyzed: sdo dang dkar ba g-yas g-yon zhal //
translated: The right and left faces are red and white.

original: rang 'dra yum ni cung zad skem //
analyzed: rang 'dra yum ni cung zad skem //
translated: The mother is similar to him, but slightly emaciated.

original: 'khyud cing yang dag mdzes par ldan //🔽gri gug ral gri 'khor lo dang // thod pa rin chen chu skyes 'bar //
analyzed: 'khyud cing yang dag mdzes par ldan // gri gug ral gri 'khor lo dang // thod pa rin chen chu skyes 'bar //
translated: She embraces him, and they are perfectly beautiful.🔽He holds a flaying knife, sword, chakram,🔽skull cup, jewel, and blazing lotus.

original: stong smad glang chen stag lpags bsnams //
analyzed: stong smad glang chen stag lpags bsnams //
translated: He wears a lower garment and an elephant and tiger skin.

original: rtog med go cha phreng bar dbyangs //
analyzed: rtog med go cha phreng bar dbyangs //
translated: He is without conceptuality, and has armor, a garland, and a belt.

original: glu brgyad phut sgra mche ba gtsigs //
analyzed: glu brgyad phut sgra mche ba gtsigs //
translated: He has eight songs, the sound of “phut,” and bared fangs.

original: me dkyil nang na bzhugs pa la //
analyzed: me dkyil nang na bzhugs pa la //
translated: He resides in the middle of a fire maṇḍala.

original: sku gsung thugs la rdo rje gsum //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs la rdo rje gsum //
translated: The three vajras are in his body, speech, and mind.

original: skye mched drug la byang chub sems //
analyzed: skye mched drug la byang chub sems //
translated: The six sense bases are bodhicitta.

original: dbang bskur spyi bor gshin rje gshed //
analyzed: dbang bskur spyi bor gshin rje gshed //
translated: Yama is crowned on the head.

original: sgo bzhi'i sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: sgo bzhi'i sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs //
translated: The four doors are empowered by the mantras.

original: rnam 'phrul mchod pa bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: rnam 'phrul mchod pa bsam mi khyab //
translated: The offerings of emanation are inconceivable.

original: phrag dog rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod //
analyzed: phrag dog rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod //
translated: You are the essence of the vajra of jealousy.

original: gshin rje gshed po las kun byed //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed po las kun byed //
translated: You are the Yamāntaka who does all activities.

original: sku yi rdo rje rab 'dra ba //
analyzed: sku yi rdo rje rab 'dra ba //
translated: You are similar to the vajra of the body.

original: ral gri phyag la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: ral gri phyag la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Homage and praise to the one with a sword in his hand.

original: rlung dang mes ni padma sbyangs //
analyzed: rlung dang mes ni padma sbyangs //
translated: The lotus is purified by the wind and fire.

original: ye shes zhu ba gsum byin brlab //
analyzed: ye shes zhu ba gsum byin brlab //
translated: The consecration of the three melting wisdoms,

original: rdo rje sbu gus mchod byas pas //
analyzed: rdo rje sbu gus mchod byas pas //
translated: The offering made with the vajra tube,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par 'gyur //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par 'gyur //
translated: Satisfies all the buddhas.

original: spro dang bsdu ba'i rnal 'byor ni //
analyzed: spro dang bsdu ba'i rnal 'byor ni //
translated: The yoga of emanating and gathering

original: kun rdzob bden pa bla med yin //
analyzed: kun rdzob bden pa bla med yin //
translated: Is the unsurpassed relative truth.

original: khab len rdo yi rnam pa ltar //
analyzed: khab len rdo yi rnam pa ltar //
translated: Like the form of a magnet,

original: bde ba'i ye shes 'dzin byed pa //
analyzed: bde ba'i ye shes 'dzin byed pa //
translated: It holds the wisdom of bliss.

original: chos kun ro gcig pa yin te //
analyzed: chos kun ro gcig pa yin te //
translated: The single taste of all phenomena

original: nan tan ye shes zhes bya'o //🔽rgyud rgyal gsang ba 'dus sogs kyi //🔽dgongs pa bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim //
analyzed: nan tan ye shes zhes bya'o // rgyud rgyal gsang ba 'dus sogs kyi // dgongs pa bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim //
translated: Is called the wisdom of practice.🔽The intention of the king of tantras, Guhyasamaja,

original: rgyud gzhung thams cad 'gal med 'dis //
analyzed: rgyud gzhung thams cad 'gal med 'dis //
translated: And so forth, is the creation and completion stages.

original: 'gro rnams nye bar 'tsho gyur cig /
analyzed: 'gro rnams nye bar 'tsho gyur cig /
translated: May all beings be sustained🔽By this noncontradiction of all the tantra texts.

original: @68a * // gshin rje gshed rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: @68a * // gshin rje gshed rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Vajra Sharpness of Yamantaka

original: slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The great master Dipamkarabhadra's composition is complete.

original: // / rnal 'byor pa pradzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
analyzed: // / rnal 'byor pa pradzny'a shr'i dzny'a na k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
translated: The yogi Prajñāśrījñānakīrti made this self-translation.
